# DATASET

## 1. Create a histogram on the diamonds dataset,

```{r 1histo, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, fig.retina=1}
ggplot(df, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "black", fill='deepskyblue4', bins=30) +
  labs(
    title = "Diamonds Histogram"
   ) 
```
